entry.title: Using Grid Named Areas to Visualize (and Reference) Your Layout
entry.summary: Whenever we build simple or complex layouts using CSS Grid, weâ€™re usually positioning items with line numbers. Grid layouts contain grid lines that are automatically indexed with positive and negative line numbers (that is unless we explicitly name them). â€¦ Using Grid Named Areas to Visualize (and Reference) Your Layout originally published on CSS-Tricks, which is part of the DigitalOcean family. You should get the newsletter.

entry.title: Using CSS Cascade Layers to Manage Custom Styles in a Tailwind Project
